name: Whitsunday Adventurer 2D/2N - Outer Reef & Extended Sails
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey through the Whitsundays and Great Barrier Reef. This adventure is perfect for those seeking to explore pristine reefs and secluded beaches, while enjoying the comfort and luxury of a well-equipped vessel. Ideal for adventure seekers and nature lovers, this tour offers a unique opportunity to snorkel or scuba dive in some of the world's most stunning marine environments. With the option to customize your experience, you can tailor your journey to include scenic flights, jet skiing, and more.
departure_location: Coral Sea Marina Meeting Point C
includes:
Shared accommodation or private double cabin
Snorkeling and scuba diving opportunities
Access to pristine reefs and beaches
Customizable experiences including scenic flights and jet skiing
highlights:
Explore the Outer Great Barrier Reef
Snorkel or scuba dive in pristine reefs
Swim and sunbathe at Whitehaven Beach
Customizable experiences with scenic flights and jet skiing
Luxurious vessel with comfortable accommodations
price_tiers: Shared Accommodation (16+): A$677 | Private Double Cabin (requires 2 people): A$1,614 (for 2 people)
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
ideal_for: Adventure seekers, nature lovers, and those looking for a luxurious yet adventurous experience in the Whitsundays and Great Barrier Reef.
important_information: ['Minimum Age is 6 years old.', 'Children ages 6-15 years must be booked into a private cabin.', 'Anyone ages 16+ can be booked into an open single.', 'Children travel on this tour at full adult rates.']

name: Whitsunday Adventurer Private Charter
description: Treat yourself to an exclusive private charter onboard one of the Whitsundays' most popular catamarans. Avoid large crowds and enjoy a customized tour to meet your every desire. Experience ultimate relaxation as your professional skipper and host take you to all the hot spots of the Whitsunday Islands at your preferred pace. Perfect for those seeking a personalized and intimate adventure through the stunning Whitsunday Islands.

highlights:

price_tiers: Private Charter (Between 01 Jul 2025 and 30 Jun 2026): A$9190
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hamilton Island,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
ideal_for: Those seeking a personalized and intimate adventure through the Whitsunday Islands.
important_information: ['The minimum age for Adventurer Private Charter is 6 years old.', 'For safety reasons ALL passengers must be able to swim and speak fluent English.']

whats_extra: ["BYO alcohol and soft drinks (refer to 'What to bring')", 'Any dietary requirements (such as vegetarian, vegan, pescatarian, gluten-free diets and dairy/lactose-free) will need to pay a surcharge of $15 per person payable on check in.', 'Kosher and Halal diets are unable to be catered for.', 'Peak holiday seasons (i.e. Christmas, Easter, New Years) may incur a surcharge.', 'Tours at sea between the 24th of December to the 2nd of January will incur a local payment once-off fee of $20 per person per night, payable direct at check in.', 'Tours departing on Easter Friday, Saturday, Sunday or Monday will incur a once-off fee of $20 per person per night, payable direct at check in.']

name: Whitsunday Pearl
description: Escape into paradise aboard the sleek and stylish catamaran, Whitsunday Pearl. This luxurious vessel offers an intimate experience with accommodations for just 8 guests in four private double cabins, each with an ensuite. Perfect for couples and small groups seeking a unique adventure, this tour combines relaxation with exploration. Enjoy snorkeling in pristine reefs, visiting the iconic Whitehaven Beach, and indulging in water sports. With spacious decks, a coffee machine, and Starlink Wifi, you'll have everything you need for a comfortable journey.

name: Powerplay 3D/3N - Outer Reef & Extended Sails
description: Embark on a breathtaking journey through the Whitsundays and the Outer Great Barrier Reef with our unique 3-night sailing adventure. name: Providence V
description: Experience the Whitsundays aboard the Providence V, a charming tall ship that offers an authentic sailing adventure. This tour is perfect for those seeking a blend of history, adventure, and relaxation. Sail to the iconic Whitehaven Beach, snorkel in crystal-clear waters, and enjoy a full day on the water. With its rich history as a replica of the American Blackfish and a star in a Hollywood movie, Providence V provides a unique sailing experience. Ideal for families, couples, and anyone eager to explore the Whitsundays in style.

name: Apollo 3D2N
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure aboard Apollo, a fully refitted 75ft Maxi yacht with a rich racing history. This 3-day, 2-night tour offers a unique opportunity to explore the stunning Whitsunday Islands. Perfect for those seeking a fun and social experience, this tour combines authentic sailing with the chance to snorkel in vibrant coral reefs and visit iconic locations like Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet. Enjoy freshly prepared meals onboard and soak up the sun with a group of like-minded travelers.

price_tiers: Adult - Hot Deal - Shared Accom (08 Dec 2025 - 28 Feb 2026): A$699 | Adult - Shared Accom (01 Oct 2025 - 30 Apr 2026): A$739
locations: Airlie Beach,Hill Inlet,Langford,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
This incredible experience begins bright and early, with guests able to check in at Coral Sea Marina from 8:00 AM, ready for a 9.30 AM departure. Our first port of call is the wondrous Stonehaven Bay with a stop via Langford Reef. Enjoy an incredibly authentic sailing experience on a world-class sailing boat with an extensive racing history. Your experienced and passionate crew will guide you through the day.
**Day 2:**
After rising early, Apollo will set sail for Tongue Bay where you'll spend the day exploring Whitehaven Beach. Boasting 7 kilometres of pristine and dazzling white silica sand, you’ll get to laze about, explore, sunbathe and bush walk to your heart’s content. Afterwards, enjoy a leisurely walk to Hill Inlet, where you’ll witness one of the most incredible views in the area. After your walk, you’ll board Apollo again and set sail for another cozy anchorage site for the evening. Get ready for a fun night ahead with games, socialising and an incredible atmosphere!
menu:
**Our Delicious Sample Menu**
Your trip aboard Apollo is accompanied by a divine menu, prepared fresh onboard from local ingredients. Check out Apollo's sample menu for an idea of the food that awaits! BYO alcohol.
ideal_for: Young adults and the young at heart seeking adventure and social engagement in a stunning natural setting.
